trans-unit.source: Validating Strings in Visual Basic | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Convalida delle stringhe in Visual Basic | Documenti di Microsoft
Convalida delle stringhe in Visual Basic

trans-unit.source: This section discusses how to validate strings in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: In questa sezione viene illustrato come convalidare le stringhe in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: [How to: Validate File Names and Paths in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-to-validate-file-names-and-paths.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: convalidare nomi e percorsi in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-to-validate-file-names-and-paths.md)

trans-unit.source: How to determine whether a string represents a file name or path.
trans-unit.target: Come determinare se una stringa rappresenta un nome file o percorso.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Validate Strings That Represent Dates or Times](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-to-validate-strings-that-represent-dates-or-times.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: Convalidare le stringhe che rappresentano date o ore](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-to-validate-strings-that-represent-dates-or-times.md)

trans-unit.source: How to determine whether a string represents a valid date.
trans-unit.target: Come determinare se una stringa rappresenta una data valida.

trans-unit.source: [Using Regular Expressions with the MaskedTextBox Control in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/using-regular-expressions-with-the-maskedtextbox-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [Utilizzo di espressioni regolari con il controllo MaskedTextBox in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/using-regular-expressions-with-the-maskedtextbox-control.md)

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to convert simple regular expressions to work with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Viene illustrato come convertire espressioni regolari semplici da utilizzare con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: How to determine whether a string has the characteristics of a strong password.
trans-unit.target: Come determinare se una stringa ha le caratteristiche di una password complessa.
